觻字的基本解释

觻
lì
兽角锋利。

觻
lù
〔觻得〕中国汉代县名，在今甘肃省张掖市西北。

觻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lù］
［《廣韻》盧谷切，入屋，來。］
古代地名用字。汉代张掖郡有觻得县。见《汉书·地理志下》。

觻字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【角字部】　觻； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1145第22
【唐韻】【集韻】?盧谷切，音祿。【說文】角也。　又縣名。【前漢·地理志】觻得，張掖郡所屬縣。【師古註】觻得渠西入澤羌谷。　又【玉篇】力的切【廣韻】郞擊切【集韻】狼狄切，?靈入聲。【類篇】獸角鋒曰觻。

觻字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
觻字的起名意思

暂无。

觻
Basic explanation of words
觻
lì
The horns are sharp.
觻
lù
〔觻得〕The name of a county in Han Dynasty in China, in the northwest of Zhangye City, Gansu Province.
觻
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lù］
["Guangyun" Lu Guqi, enter the house, come. ]
Ancient place names use words. In the Han Dynasty, Zhangye County had Hude County. See "Hanshu·Geography II".
觻
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Jiao Zi Department] 　觻; Kangxi strokes: 22; page number: page 1145 22
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Lu Guqie, Yinlu. [Said the text] Jiao Ye.　Also the county name. [Pre-Han Geography] Hude, a county belonging to Zhangye County. [Annotation to Teachers] Gou got Quxi into Zeqiang Valley.　[Yu Pian] Powerful cut [Guang Yun] Tan hit cut [Ji Yun] Wolf Di cut,? Spirit enters the sound. 【Classes】The beast horns Feng said, 觻.
